alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 4:33AM CDT until October 27 at 12:43PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... West Fork Trinity River At Grand Prairie affecting Tarrant and Dallas Counties. Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Trinity River at Grand Prairie. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Moderate flooding will occur along the lowland areas of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest near 28.2 feet this morning. It will fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
